name: Retail Loan
description: Provides diversified loan services for individual customers, including consumer loans, housing loans, car loans, and other types of credit products.

overview.summary: A digital credit solution covering the entire lifecycle of pre-loan, in-loan, and post-loan, featuring a highly flexible product configuration factory, a data-driven intelligent risk control system, and refined marketing and collection operational capabilities.

modules.name: Retail Loan Core
modules.description: Provides core accounting processing capabilities for loan business, including accounts, products, interest calculation, disbursement, and repayment.

functions.title: Customer Account Management
functions.description: Includes account opening, closing, restarting, and account information modifications.

functions.title: Product Configuration Factory
functions.description: Loan products support highly flexible configuration; new products can be fully configured and launched.

functions.title: Disbursement and Repayment Functions
functions.description: Supports disbursement and repayment functions, including reverse transactions, disbursement cancellation, and repayment cancellation.

functions.title: Interest Calculation and Accrual
functions.description: Supports various interest calculation methods, highly configurable.

functions.title: Bill Management
functions.description: Bill product creation, update, display, and related functions.

functions.title: Asset Disposal
functions.description: Supports asset disposal methods such as ABS, write-offs, insurance claims.

functions.title: Reconciliation System
functions.description: Includes but is not limited to transaction reconciliation, balance reconciliation, and reasonableness analysis.

functions.title: Accounting Processing
functions.description: Supports accounting processes, tax splitting, general ledger reporting, etc.

functions.title: Asset Restructuring
functions.description: Functions such as refinancing, extensions, etc.

functions.title: Product Workflow Management
functions.description: Covers processes like account opening, disbursement, repayment, non-financial operations, etc., with flow orchestration.

functions.title: Customer Agreement Center
functions.description: Manages agreements for online proactive repayment, batch deductions, incoming payments, internal repayment waivers, enabling fine-tuned operations to boost repayment rates.

functions.title: Pricing Center
functions.description: Manages product pricing, supports various implementations like rule packs and rule tables.

functions.title: Incoming Payment Center
functions.description: Supports incoming payment deposits and repayments; enables full or partial customer-level settlements.

functions.title: Style Center
functions.description: Displays different front-end styles for customers based on segments, tags, or metrics.

functions.title: Product Contract Management
functions.description: Manages contracts for different products under different scenarios.

functions.title: Deduction Center
functions.description: Manages reconciliation files, error files.

functions.title: Batch Reminders
functions.description: Includes bill due reminders, negative credit reporting reminders, etc.

functions.title: Customer Debit Agreement Management
functions.description: Manages card list inquiries, customer card unbinding, etc.

functions.title: Flexible Batch Deduction Management
functions.description: Handles flexible batch deduction decisions, intelligent deductions, end-of-day reconciliation, lightweight reconciliation.

functions.title: Online Transaction Capabilities(Real-time not T+1)
functions.description: Provides online transaction capabilities, manages ledger accounts.

functions.title: Customer Account Information Inquiry
functions.description: Daily operations management: query customer basic info, account details, transaction records, deposit history, loan details, etc.

functions.title: Manual Repayment/Adjustment
functions.description: Allows manual file uploads using system templates for scenarios like early settlement, penalty interest adjustments, manual repayments, etc.

functions.title: Write-off File Processing
functions.description: Lets operators upload lists of loans pending write-off; after approval, batch processes write-offs at end-of-day.

functions.title: Ledger Reconciliation Management
functions.description: Checks whether internal account amounts are correct.

modules.name: Credit Risk Control
modules.description: Provides risk control and decision-making capabilities for the entire pre-loan, in-loan, and post-loan process.

functions.title: External Credit Data Integration & Variable Derivation
functions.description: Interfaces external data sources for risk automation, supports writing Python snippets for variable derivation.

functions.title: Automated Approval Strategy Management
functions.description: Supports publishing and running Experian strategy packages.

functions.title: Approval Workflow Management(Limit management)
functions.description: Manages workflows like blacklist approvals, fraud checks, identity verification, credit limit/price adjustments.

functions.title: Scoring Model Management
functions.description: Supports validation and operation of machine learning models.

functions.title: Remote Review Platform (Optional)
functions.description: For high-risk or unclear automated approvals, routes to manual review with tools like auto-calling, guided questionnaires, photo/video verification, etc.

functions.title: Mid-loan Decision Management (Optional)
functions.description: Post-disbursement risk decisions for repeat borrowers, silent customers, etc., driving credit limit and risk level adjustments.

functions.title: Business Identity Verification
functions.description: Queries business data, small business info, completes personal business identity verification.

functions.title: Unified Business Loan Limit Management
functions.description: Manages credit lines at the personal and enterprise level.

functions.title: External Credit Data Integration & Variable Derivation
functions.description: Interfaces external data sources for risk automation, supports writing Python snippets for variable derivation.

functions.title: Customer Identity Verification (KYC)
functions.description: Integrates facial recognition in approval processes to verify customer identity against submitted facial data.

functions.title: Anti-Fraud Strategy Management
functions.description: Executes Experian strategies, builds inputs, and makes anti-fraud decisions based on outputs.

functions.title: Anti-Fraud Model Management
functions.description: Executes machine learning models, builds inputs, and makes anti-fraud decisions from model outputs.

modules.name: Marketing Operations
modules.description: Supports marketing activities, customer segmentation, and refined operations.

functions.title: Rewards Management
functions.description: Enables flexible marketing configurations and cost control through differentiated rewards combinations and precise accounting (e.g., cashback posting).

functions.title: Marketing Audience Tag Library
functions.description: Builds a tagging system across product, risk, marketing, external data; supports dynamic subscriptions and combination strategies for precise targeting and scenario-based marketing.

functions.title: Marketing Material Management
functions.description: Manages full lifecycle (upload, review, takedown) of marketing materials, supports A/B testing, personalized content matching, and dynamic optimization.

functions.title: Marketing Channel Management
functions.description: Uses smart routing engines and multi-channel gateways (e.g., app, SMS, outbound calls) to optimize touchpoints and low-efficiency channels.

functions.title: Marketing Activity Management
functions.description: Modular support for full-cycle activity configuration (strategy, channel, rewards, audience), A/B testing, marketing calendars, enabling hour-level launches and next-day performance analysis.

functions.title: Activity Monitoring and Analysis
functions.description: Real-time dashboards tracking conversion, interactions; multi-dimensional funnel analysis and second-level alerts driving dynamic strategy adjustments.

functions.title: Activity Effect Attribution
functions.description: Integrates multi-source data, applies models (first-touch, last-touch, time decay) to quantify channel contributions, guiding operations, product, and activity optimization.

modules.name: Personal Loan Collection Operations
modules.description: Provides professional post-loan collection operations and management capabilities.

functions.title: Case Creation for Collections
functions.description: Converts overdue customer lists from the loan core into collection cases and stores them daily.

functions.title: Automatic Case Assignment
functions.description: Automatically assigns collection cases to agencies, teams, or agents based on predefined rules during daily batch runs.

functions.title: Manual Case Assignment
functions.description: Manually assigns cases to specified agencies, teams, or agents.

functions.title: Case Closure for Collections
functions.description: Closes and cleans up collection cases based on settled customer lists received from the loan core.

functions.title: Collection Work Order Management
functions.description: Queries, assigns, exports collection cases; views case details; adds collection action records; manages customer profiles.

functions.title: Outbound Operations
functions.description: Uses softphone calls or notification services to send collection messages to customers.

functions.title: Case Hold
functions.description: Temporarily pauses collection activities for special customers (e.g., frequent complaints, sensitive groups).

functions.title: Performance Management
functions.description: Queries operational and performance data, rankings for agencies and collectors through collection reports.

modules.name: Credit Data Management
modules.description: Builds unified credit data assets and provides data analysis and service capabilities.

functions.title: Data Asset Management
functions.description: Supports credit card data asset definition (standard fields, table fields, interface fields, tag metrics); standardizes business fields; offers configurable, componentized table/interface/tag design.

functions.title: Data Asset View Management
functions.description: Provides IT views for managing data asset standards, order, quality; offers business views for scenario-based asset management.

functions.title: Data Asset Version Management
functions.description: Provides lifecycle and version management, records production versions, manages lifecycle, and controls downstream access.

functions.title: Data Asset Usage Management
functions.description: Provides online configuration capabilities for data asset applications.

functions.title: Data Asset Hotspot Monitoring
functions.description: Monitors usage hotspots of data assets.

functions.title: Data Asset Lineage Analysis
functions.description: Analyzes the impact of data asset changes.

functions.title: Data Source Access Management
functions.description: Supports unified access and management of multiple data sources, ensuring real-time business data sync and centralized report data storage/querying.

functions.title: Data Dashboard & Email Reporting
functions.description: Provides dynamic dashboards showing key metrics, supports scheduled email delivery of custom reports for timely business monitoring.

functions.title: Report Indicator Management
functions.description: Flexibly configures product indicator data (e.g., delinquency rates, approval rates) to meet analysis needs across departments/scenarios.

functions.title: Visual Report Analysis Configuration
functions.description: Uses drag-and-drop tools to quickly generate interactive visual reports (bar charts, pie charts, icons, text reports, funnels, data maps, user behavior analysis, etc.).

modules.name: Credit Business Monitoring
modules.description: Provides a panoramic monitoring dashboard for the credit business.

functions.title: Loan Scale Monitoring
functions.description: Monitors loan scale risk changes, risk aggregation, and provides alerts.

functions.title: Customer Scale Monitoring
functions.description: Monitor the business scale from transactional-related-parameter angle

functions.title: Transaction Metric Monitoring
functions.description: Monitor the business scale from customer-related-parameter angle

functions.title: Exception Metric Monitoring
functions.description: Monitor product anormaly

modules.name: Outbound Call Bot
modules.description: Provides intelligent outbound calling capabilities, supporting marketing and collection scenarios.

functions.title: Outbound Work Order Management
functions.description: Manages inbound work orders, call dispatching, outcome reporting, annotation quality checks, etc.

functions.title: Telecom Channel Integration
functions.description: Manages integrated telecom operators, number pools, etc.

functions.title: Automated Outbound Strategy Management
functions.description: Manages configuration, approval, and concurrent parameters of outbound robots.

functions.title: Conversation Decision Tree Management
functions.description: Manages configuration and approval of dialogue flows.

functions.title: ASR Model Management
functions.description: Manages and maintains ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) models for speech-to-text.

functions.title: NLU Model Management
functions.description: Manages and maintains NLU (Natural Language Understanding) models for interpreting text semantics and generating replies.

functions.title: TTS Model Management
functions.description: Manages and maintains TTS (Text-to-Speech) models supporting multiple languages/dialects.

modules.name: Loan Document Management
modules.description: Manages various image and document materials during loan application, approval, and duration.

functions.title: Unstructured Information Entry
functions.description: Supports single/double recording modes for entering unstructured data, ensuring input accuracy.

functions.title: Difficult Case Escalation and Management
functions.description: Escalates unclear work orders to difficult cases for handling by more experienced staff.

functions.title: Entry Work Order Management
functions.description: Manages ongoing and completed work orders, views entered information, and tracks operator actions.

functions.title: Template Management
functions.description: Manages various e-seal templates, queries different stamp templates.

functions.title: Document Synthesis
functions.description: Dynamic template synthesis, batch template synthesis, PDF template synthesis, PDF form synthesis (pdfXFA), standard template synthesis (ID card synthesis), CDN templates, Excel templates, PDF merge templates, Word template synthesis.

functions.title: Operations Management
functions.description: Manages seal configurations, document templates, scripts, and dynamic templates.

functions.title: Document Processing
functions.description: Adds watermarks, removes watermarks, edits documents (highlight/fill), encrypts documents, parses metadata, converts PDFs to images, compresses PDFs, PDF-to-data extraction using machine learning.

functions.title: Anti-counterfeit Verification
functions.description: Supports ESM seal verification, ESEAL seal verification, ESS seal verification, signature verification portals, and third-party seal verification.

functions.title: Archive Classification Management
functions.description: Manages storage classifications like contracts, images, etc.

functions.title: Archive Storage
functions.description: Uses big data tasks to archive offline storage of various contract and image data.
